front.title: Call on hold for telephony applications of SIP protocol

abstract.t: Many RFCs and Internet Drafts describe call on hold methods adopted in SIP signaling protocol. The actual implementation may not always be ideal for telephony applications (reasons are explained below). This draft proposes a revision of call on hold method for SIP protocol. Giordano [page 1] Internet-Draft Call on hold for telephony applications of SIP protocol
